Dead Space.name: Dead Space
Dead Space.description: The sci-fi survival-horror classic returns, completely rebuilt to offer an even more immersive experience — including visual, audio, and gameplay improvements — while staying faithful to the original game’s thrilling vision.

Red Dead Redemption 2.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
Red Dead Redemption 2.description: Winner of over 175 Game of the Year Awards and recipient of over 250 perfect scores, RDR2 is the epic tale of outlaw Arthur Morgan and the infamous Van der Linde gang, on the run across America at the dawn of the modern age. Also includes access to the shared living world of Red Dead Online.

Rust.name: Rust
Rust.description: The only aim in Rust is to survive. Everything wants you to die - the island’s wildlife and other inhabitants, the environment, other survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another night.

Garry's Mod.name: Garry's Mod
Garry's Mod.description: Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

Project Zomboid.name: Project Zomboid
Project Zomboid.description: Project Zomboid is the ultimate in zombie survival. Alone or in MP: you loot, build, craft, fight, farm and fish in a struggle to survive. A hardcore RPG skillset, a vast map, massively customisable sandbox and a cute tutorial raccoon await the unwary. So how will you die? All it takes is a bite...

Sea of Thieves.name: Sea of Thieves
Sea of Thieves.description: Sea of Thieves offers the essential pirate experience, from sailing and fighting to exploring and looting – everything you need to live the pirate life and become a legend in your own right. With no set roles, you have complete freedom to approach the world, and other players, however you choose.

Fallout: New Vegas.name: Fallout: New Vegas
Fallout: New Vegas.description: Welcome to Vegas. New Vegas. Enjoy your stay!

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edit.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edit.description: Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, Skyrim Special Edition brings the epic fantasy to life in stunning detail. The Special Edition includes the critically acclaimed game and add-ons with all-new features like remastered art and effects, volumetric god rays, dynamic depth of field, screen-space...

Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege.description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Siege is an elite, tactical team-based shooter where superior planning and execution triumph.
